mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (from_user_id, to_user_id, content, create_time, status) VALUES (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE (from_user_id = #{userId} AND to_user_id = #{targetId}) OR (from_user_id = #{targetId} AND to_user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY create_time ASC
